overview:
Alfred Chuang is CEO and Founder of Magnet Systems Inc. Previously, Mr. Chuang was a founder of BEA Systems Inc., a leader provider of enterprise infrastructure middleware products. During his tenure he managed just about every aspect of the company before becoming CEO in October 2001. Mr. Chuang became BEAâ€™s chairman of the board where he remained until BEA was sold to Oracle in 2008 for 8.5 billion dollars.

Mr. Chuang also worked at Sun Microsystems, Inc., where he had held management positions in the critical areas of software product development, systems architecture, and operations management for over 9 years. He pioneered and prototyped the implementation of TCP/IP on the IBM PC platform.
